Package org.svvrl.goal.core.layout

Class KKLayout

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.AbstractLayout
org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.KKLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layout
public class KKLayout
extends AbstractLayout
This class provides an implementation of the algorithm in [Tomihisa Kamada and Satoru Kawai. An Algorithm for Drawing General Undirected Graphs. Information Processing Letters, 31:7-15, 1989].
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String KKLayoutEpsilonKey
    The key of the option of the epsilon parameter.
    static java.lang.String KKLayoutLengthWithRespectToWindowKey
    Indicates if the area available for the graph is calculated based on the window size or node size.
    static java.lang.String KKLayoutMaxInnerLoopIterationsKey
    The key of the option of maximal inner loop iterations.
    static java.lang.String KKLayoutMaxOuterLoopIterationsKey
    The key of the option of maximal outer loop iterations.
    static java.lang.String KKLayoutRandomOrderKey
    Indicates if the nodes are placed in a random order.
    static java.lang.String KKLayoutStrengthConstantKey
    The key of the option of the strength constant K.

    • layout

      public void layout​(Graph g, java.awt.Rectangle r, AlgorithmListener listener)
      Description copied from interface: Layout
      Lay out a specified graph by this layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      g - a graph to be laid out
      r - an area available for the graph g
      listener - a listener that is interested in the progress of the layout
